Articles.Content:
I am trying this tutorial, to learn about this... but there is a point in the tutorial that Gene Kerman ask me to accelerate... but in the tutorial there is only a pod; there is not fuel neither rocket !!! so there is no way to make grow the 'Ap'.

What is wrong?

I am using 1.1.1.1250 with Redux and Alarm Clock mods.

First of all, you should update to 1.1.2 (build 1260). This will probably solve your issue.

In any event, you should have a 3-engined craft called Orbiter something-or-other.

Final thought - you don't need to stage (spacebar) at any time during the tutorial. However there is a decoupler on your rocket so that, at the end, you can re-enter safely. If you have staged this by accident, you will indeed only have a pod and no engines...

Edited May 12, 2016 by Plusck

The same happens in tutorial 'To the Mun'.

This situation is at the star of the scenario, the tutorial, so I don't stage.

In the tutorial 'From the Mun', the spacecraft is 'landed' on Mun, but just at the star, it explodes.

Again, update to 1.1.2 (build 1260).

Since you are clearly suffering bugs, it would be better to do a fresh download. Move your saves elsewhere (if you have any) and then delete the whole 1.1.1. folder from your computer, then re-download the latest version. Avoid reinstalling your saves or any mods until you're sure it's working right in the tutorials.

And also check that your mods are the latest versions, and specifically updated for 1.1.2
